context.name: Form Pistol Grip for Chiappa Rhino LH -Black Laminte
context.excerpt: Customise your Chiappa Pistol with these target grips from Form Rifle stocks.
context.content:
You can now customise your Chiappa Chiappa Rhino with target pistol grips from Form Rifle stocks. This is LH variant.

Chiappa Rhino Pistol Grip Features:

Highly ergonomic target grip
Available in right-hand and left-hand versions
Outstanding oil finish
CNC machined for a perfect fit
Supplied with fitting spanner for the UK spec LBR
